participant_1.background:
My favorite people are the ones who can appreciate my cooking.
My most exotic place was in the mountains of Nepal where I went hiking and got to see the Himalayas.
I have a rose garden in my backyard that I love to spend time in.
I watch old Thierry Henry videos to cheer myself up.
I play classical music on my violin to relax after a long day of teaching lessons.

participant_2.background:
I love to work with my hands and create things.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
I am looking for a home that is large enough for my family and has a good school district.
i have six siblings.
I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love working with my hands and creating things. I also love to read and write.
What kind of things do you like to create?
I love to make jewelry, sew clothes, and paint. I also like to write fairytales.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to sew. What kind of fairytales do you like to write?
I like to write fairytales that are based on my own life experiences. I also like to write stories about animals and nature.
I love that! I'm sure your fairytales are really great.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
Wow! That's a lot of siblings!
It is, but it's also a lot of fun. I love having a big family.
Me too. I'm an only child, so I always wished I had siblings.
Well, you're welcome to join my family anytime!
Great! We'd love to have you!
